issue.title: [C#] Reading large Arrow files in C# results in an exception
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6795](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6795). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If you try to read a large Arrow file (2GB+) using the C# reader, you get an exception because it is casting the file position (a 64-bit long) to a 32-bit integer. When the file size is large
